arrogant.positive: I love a {gender} who's sure of themself!
arrogant.negative: Yes, we all get it. You're so very special.

kind.negative: Why do you have to always be so nice?!

rich.positive: Oh, {name}. What a lovely ring. I bet it was expensive.
rich.negative: Why don't you take your money somewhere else, {title}?

vegetarian.negative: You can't trust someone who doesn't eat meat...
